meanings.definition: Attractive or stylish in a flashy or showy way.
meanings.sent1: The performer wore a pizzazzy costume on stage.
meanings.sent2: Her outfit was so pizzazzy that everyone complimented her style.
meanings.sent3: The pizzazzy dress caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent4: The car's pizzazzy paint job made it stand out in the parking lot.
meanings.sent5: The store window display was pizzazzy with bright colors and lights.

meanings.sent1: The children's pizzazzy dance moves entertained the audience.
meanings.sent2: The concert was pizzazzy with the crowd cheering and clapping.
meanings.sent3: His pizzazzy storytelling kept everyone engaged till the end.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were pizzazzy with bustling activity and noise.
meanings.sent5: The sports event was pizzazzy with fans cheering and waving flags.

meanings.definition: Having a lot of flair or charisma.
meanings.sent1: The actor's pizzazzy performance captivated the audience.
meanings.sent2: She has a pizzazzy personality that lights up the room.
meanings.sent3: His pizzazzy jokes always make everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The leader's pizzazzy speech inspired the team to work harder.
meanings.sent5: The artist's pizzazzy paintings drew a large crowd to the gallery.
